description: Router.execute(Input,AbsoluteTokenAmount,SwapDescription) (contracts/router/Router.sol#148-245) ignores return value by Address.functionCall(swapDescription.caller,abi.encodeCall(ICaller.callBytes,swapDescription.callerCallData),R: callBytes failed w/ no reason) (contracts/router/Router.sol#180-184)
markdown: [Router.execute(Input,AbsoluteTokenAmount,SwapDescription)](contracts/router/Router.sol#L148-L245) ignores return value by [Address.functionCall(swapDescription.caller,abi.encodeCall(ICaller.callBytes,swapDescription.callerCallData),R: callBytes failed w/ no reason)](contracts/router/Router.sol#L180-L184)

description:
Reentrancy in Router.validateAndExpireAccountSignature(Input,AbsoluteTokenAmount,SwapDescription,AccountSignature) (contracts/router/Router.sol#347-374):
	External calls:
	- ! SignatureChecker.isValidSignatureNow(swapDescription.account,hashedAccountSignatureData,accountSignature.signature) (contracts/router/Router.sol#366-370)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- markHashUsed(hashedAccountSignatureData) (contracts/router/Router.sol#373)
		- isHashUsed_[hashToMark] = true (contracts/router/SignatureVerifier.sol#169)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [Router.validateAndExpireAccountSignature(Input,AbsoluteTokenAmount,SwapDescription,AccountSignature)](contracts/router/Router.sol#L347-L374):
	External calls:
	- [! SignatureChecker.isValidSignatureNow(swapDescription.account,hashedAccountSignatureData,accountSignature.signature)](contracts/router/Router.sol#L366-L370)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [markHashUsed(hashedAccountSignatureData)](contracts/router/Router.sol#L373)
		- [isHashUsed_[hashToMark] = true](contracts/router/SignatureVerifier.sol#L169)

description:
Ownable.setPendingOwner(address).newPendingOwner (contracts/shared/Ownable.sol#65) lacks a zero-check on :
		- pendingOwner_ = newPendingOwner (contracts/shared/Ownable.sol#68)
markdown:
[Ownable.setPendingOwner(address).newPendingOwner](contracts/shared/Ownable.sol#L65) lacks a zero-check on :
		- [pendingOwner_ = newPendingOwner](contracts/shared/Ownable.sol#L68)

description:
Router.validateProtocolFeeSignature(Input,AbsoluteTokenAmount,SwapDescription,ProtocolFeeSignature) (contracts/router/Router.sol#383-422) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > protocolFeeSignature.deadline (contracts/router/Router.sol#419)
markdown:
[Router.validateProtocolFeeSignature(Input,AbsoluteTokenAmount,SwapDescription,ProtocolFeeSignature)](contracts/router/Router.sol#L383-L422) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [block.timestamp > protocolFeeSignature.deadline](contracts/router/Router.sol#L419)
